Posts.Content:
Howdy, I'm Tammy. I just turned 43 on 04/13/13 I was Dx 04/03/09 at almost 39 years old. (Happy Birthday to me) with ILC (invasive lobular carsinoma) w/extensive mets to bone. Er/Pr + Her2 - . Hormone treatments failed and have been on Taxol since 01/2012, 3 weeks on 2 weeks off. 3 wonderful kiddo's that are almost (girl) 13 in June, (boy) 17 in a week and (boy/man) 23. I take everything one day at a time and spend as much time as possible with my kids. I've gone through 3 rounds of radiation 1 on hip 1 on sholder and 1 on spine. I'm allergic to Zometa and Aredia vaused me to be hospitalized with jaw infections 3 times. So I'm not on that anymore. I take Arthrotec that teally helps alot with the pain and what seems like a dozen more meds and suppluments a couple times a day. Hoping to be here for many more years to come.
Dx 04/03/09 with Stage 4 ILC (Invasive Lobular Carcinoma) Breast Cancer with extensive mets to bone. Er+ PR + Her2- hormone treatment has failed so I am on Taxol, 3 weeks on 2 weeks off. Given 2-6 months life expectancy at diagnosis.
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
